metadata.title: Software Engineer Resume Template
metadata.description: A professional resume template tailored for software engineering positions, highlighting technical skills and project experience

template_tips: Include metrics and impact where possible
Highlight both technical and soft skills
Keep it to one page unless you have 10+ years of experience

resume_content.summary: Results-driven Software Engineer with experience in full-stack development, focusing on scalable web applications and microservices architecture. Proven track record of delivering high-quality solutions and optimizing application performance.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
achievements: Led development of microservices-based application serving 1M+ users
Reduced API response time by 40% through optimization
Mentored 5 junior developers and led technical interviews

experience.title: Software Engineer
achievements: Developed and maintained RESTful APIs using Node.js
Implemented automated testing, achieving 90% code coverage
Collaborated with product team to launch 3 major features

projects.name: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: Built full-stack e-commerce platform using React and Node.js
